mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_ATTD_NUMBER VALUES ( NULL, #{randomNumber}, #{classNo }, b_attd_seq.nextval, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT attd_no FROM (SELECT * FROM b_attd_number WHERE class_no = #{classNo } and created_date is null order by attd_no desc) where rownum=1

SELECT AAA.created_date, AAA.random_number, AAA.class_no, AAA.attd_no, AAA.class_name, AAA.start_time, totalusertable.total_user , attdusertable.attd_total_user FROM (SELECT class_no, COUNT(*) total_user FROM b_class_user GROUP BY class_no ) totalusertable, (SELECT an.created_date, an.random_number, an.class_no, an.attd_no, c.CLASS_NAME, C.START_TIME FROM B_ATTD_NUMBER an , b_class c WHERE an.CREATED_DATE between to_date(#{strDate} ,'YYYYMMDDHHmi') and to_date('2015 12 08','YYYYMMDDHHmi')+1
AND an.class_no IN (select class_no from b_class_user where class_role = #{classRole} and user_no= #{userNo} )
AND an.CLASS_NO = c.CLASS_NO ORDER BY class_no ) AAA , (SELECT attd_no, COUNT(*)attd_total_user FROM B_Attendance GROUP BY attd_no ) attdusertable WHERE AAA.class_no = totalusertable.class_no AND AAA.attd_no = attdusertable.attd_no

SELECT created_date, an.CLASS_NO, an.ATTD_NO, c.class_name, c.START_TIME FROM b_attd_number an , b_class c WHERE an.class_no IN (SELECT class_no FROM b_class_user WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ) AND an.CLASS_NO = c.CLASS_NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT timer_min AS timerMin, to_char(created_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh:mi:ss') AS createdDate FROM B_ATTD_NUMBER WHERE class_no =#{classNo } AND created_date BETWEEN to_date('20151210','YYYY.MM.DD.') AND to_date('20151231','YYYY.MM.DD.')+1 AND created_date IS NOT NULL AND timer_min IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_date DESC) WHERE rownum=1

SELECT created_date AS createdDate, class_no AS classNo, class_name AS className, start_time AS classTime, timer_min AS timerMin, attd_time AS attdTime
FROM( SELECT to_char(created_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh:mi:ss')AS created_date, an.random_number, an.class_no, an.attd_no, an.timer_min, c.class_name, c.START_TIME, an.start_time AS attd_time FROM b_attd_number an, b_class c WHERE an.class_no IN (SELECT class_no from b_class_user where user_no =#{userNo }) AND an.created_date BETWEEN to_date(#{date },'YYYY.MM.DD.') AND to_date(#{date },'YYYY.MM.DD.')+1 AND an.created_date IS NOT NULL AND an.timer_min IS NOT NULL AND an.class_no = c.class_no ORDER BY an.CREATED_DATE desc) WHERE rownum=1

SELECT attd_no FROM ( SELECT created_date, class_no, attd_no, rownum as temporder FROM (SELECT created_date, class_no, attd_no FROM B_ATTD_NUMBER WHERE created_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{classDate},'YYYYMMDDHH24mi') AND TO_DATE(#{classDate},'YYYYMMDDHH24mi')+1 AND class_no = #{classNo } ORDER BY created_date asc) ) WHERE temporder =#{attdIndex}
